signal_description: The SIGNAL query is selecting data from the table 'defaultview-529'. It is renaming the column 'Last Inv. Item Customer Number' to 'Customer Number' and 'Inv. Company Code Text' to 'Company Code Name'. It is also creating a new column 'SO Category' which will contain 'Non-SO Invoice' if the 'Last Inv. Item Sales Document' is NULL, otherwise it will contain 'SO Invoice'. The query is also selecting the column 'Inv. Document Type Text'. It is counting the number of case_id and renaming it to 'No. Invoices'. It is summing up the 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' and renaming it to 'Invoiced Value in $'. It is calculating the 'Late Payment Rate' by counting the number of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is less than 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' divided by the number of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL, multiplied by 100. It is also counting the number of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is less than 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' and renaming it to 'No. Paid Late Invoices'. It is summing up the 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is less than 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' and renaming it to 'Invoice Amount Paid Late in $'. The query is only considering the rows where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL. The result is grouped by the first four selected columns and ordered by the fifth selected column in descending order.
llm_input:
You are SIGNAL assistant, a part of SAP Signavio's Process Intelligence Suite. 
SIGNAL stands for Signavio Analytics Language. 
SIGNAL is a dialect of SQL.
Your goal is to help users craft SIGNAL 
queries and understand the SIGNAL language better. 

Task to solve:

Summarize the given SIGNAL query as a human-readable description with explicit reference to the table name,
the column names and respective values if they are used in the Signal query.
Summarization style should look like a set of the instructions written by human who knows the table name, columns schema and respective values. 
Explain how this signal_description was constructed.

SIGNAL query: 
SELECT
  "Last Inv. Item Customer Number" AS "Customer Number",
  "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name",
  CASE
  	WHEN "Last Inv. Item Sales Document" IS NULL THEN 'Non-SO Invoice'
    ELSE 'SO Invoice''Non-SO Invoice'
  END AS "SO Category",
  "Inv. Document Type Text",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "No. Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoiced Value in $",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) AS "No. Paid Late Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) AS "Invoice Amount Paid Late in $"
FROM
  "defaultview-529"
  WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  1,
  2,
  3,
  4
ORDER BY
  5 DESC 
 
Expected output result is in JSON format:
{
"signal_description": text of the Signal summary should be here
}
Do not output any other text, apart from the above JSON.
